info.title: Microsoft Power Platform REST API
info.description: Unified API for all administrative capabilities in Microsoft Power Platform

get.description: Get list of available application packages for a tenant
get.summary: Get list of Application Packages that are available for a tenant

parameters.description: Environment Id (not to be confused with Org id)
parameters.name: environmentId

get.description: Get list of Application Packages that are relevant in the context of a target environment. Client can filter the Application Packages based on Install State (NotInstalled, Installed, All) and any other response parameters utilizing standard OData capabilities
get.summary: Get list of Application Packages that are available for install in a target environment.

parameters.description: Environment Id (not to be confused with Org id)
parameters.name: environmentId

parameters.description: Payload to be sent during installation of the Package
parameters.name: body

post.summary: Trigger installation of an application package based on the package unique name into a target environment.

parameters.description: Environment Id (not to be confused with Org id)
parameters.name: environmentId

get.summary: Get the polling status for a previously triggered installation

Gets the defined container level Lockbox policies in a tenant.(No container policy returned if Lockbox policy at tenant applies for ALL)
Example usage of top query parameter for policies list : ?$expand=value($top=3;$expand=*) .
Gets defined/derived container policy for specific container Id.

Lists the Power Platform Lockbox requests for a container (can be filtered on Status).
Example usage of top and filter query parameter for requests list : ?$expand=value($top=3;$expand=*;$filter=Status eq 'DenialReceived') .

Gets the Lockbox policy at tenant level. To get defined container policies
please refer to "containerPolicies" parameter in response body .

post.summary: Creates Lockbox policy at tenant level or at container level .

patch.summary: Updates Lockbox policy at tenant level or at container level .

get.summary:
Lists the Power Platform Lockbox requests for a tenant and Product Type (can be filtered on Status).
Example usage of top and filter query parameter for requests list : ?$expand=value($top=3;$expand=*;$filter=Status eq 'DenialReceived') .

post.summary: Creates a Power Platform Lockbox requests for a tenant and Product type.

get.summary: Gets the Power Platform Lockbox request.

parameters.description: The flag to indicate whether to return default policy or not.
parameters.name: getDefaultIfNotExist

get.summary: Gets Teams environment inactivity policies for a tenant.

post.summary: Creates the Teams environment inactivity policy.

get.summary: Gets the Teams environment inactivity policy.

patch.summary: Updates the Teams environment inactivity policy.

get.summary: Get the list of billing policy for the tenant.
